summary: study aims to compare efficacy of three PPE ensembles. 59 participants randomly performed PPE donning and doffing. protocol deviations were observed during PPE doffing. electronic supplementary material The online version of this article (10.1186/s13756-018-0433-y) contains supplementary material. additional files Additional file 1: (1.6MB, jpg) Figure S1. Hospital Authority Standard Ebola PPE set (PPE1).
